mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (qcode, qsubject, qcontent, qisanswer, qcreated, userId) VALUES (#{QUESTION_seq.NEXTVAL}, #{qsubject}, #{qcontent} , #{qisanswer} ,#{qcreated}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO questionanswer (qcode, asubject, acontent, acreated, userName, userId) VALUES (#{qcode} , #{asubject}, #{acontent} , #{acreated} ,#{userName}, #{userId})
